item.title: CsKPI1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsKPI1 Gene Name: Kunitz protease inhibitor 1 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: Under Ectropis oblique attack, CsKPI1 expression and jasmonic acid (JA) levels were more abundant in both insect-damaged leaf tissues and undamaged neighboring leaves.

item.title: CsKPI2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsKPI2 Gene Name: Kunitz protease inhibitor 2 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: The overall findings suggest that the transcriptional divergence of KPI genes after duplication led to the specialized role of CsKPI1 in the physiological response to insect stress; the functional conservation between CsKPI2 and CsKPI3 confers resistance to pathogen infection in tea plant.

item.title: CsKPI3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsKPI3 Gene Name: Kunitz protease inhibitor 3 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: The overall findings suggest that the transcriptional divergence of KPI genes after duplication led to the specialized role of CsKPI1 in the physiological response to insect stress; the functional conservation between CsKPI2 and CsKPI3 confers resistance to pathogen infection in tea plant.

item.title: GhJAZ2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D06G0810 Gene Symbol: GhJAZ2 Gene Name: jasmonate2 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhJAZ2 attenuates cotton resistance to biotic stresses via the inhibition of the transcriptional activity of GhbHLH171.

item.title: GmVSPβ
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08g200100 Gene Symbol: GmVSPβ Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmN:IFR play crucial roles in coordinated plant defense regulation, which provides valuable information for understanding the molecular mechanisms involved in insect-induced transcriptional regulation in soybean.

item.title: GoPGF
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A12G2172 Gene Symbol: GoPGF Gene Name: Gossypium Pigment Gland Formation Genome: NBI_Gossypium_hirsutum_v1.

item.title: IbNAC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: IbNAC1 Gene Name: NAC transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Ipomoea batatas Functional Descriptions: IbNAC1 was constitutively expressed in root tissues and was induced earlier than sporamin following the wounding of leaves.

item.title: LjbHLH7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Lj0g3v0343449 Gene Symbol: LjbHLH7 Gene Name: MeJA-responsive bHLH transcription factor Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: MeJA-responsive bHLH transcription factor LjbHLH7 regulates cyanogenic glucoside biosynthesis in Lotus japonicus.

item.title: NaPME1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NaPME1 Gene Name: putative pectin methylesterase Genome: Species: Nicotiana attenuata Functional Descriptions: Pectin methylesterase NaPME1 contributes to the emission of methanol during insect herbivory and to the elicitation of defence responses in Nicotiana attenuata.
